headline: MAR Q1 Earnings Call: Revenue Beats Expectations Amid Cautious U.S. Outlook and Growth in International Segments
summary: Global hospitality company Marriott (NASDAQ:MAR) reported revenue ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 4.8% year on year to $6.26 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.32 per share was 3.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Marriott announces first Gaylord Hotels property in California
summary: Gaylord Pacific marks a significant expansion for Marriott's portfolio, particularly its group and convention offerings.
